name: smack-packages
description: AI Development Platform - React Native, Game Development, and Fullstack Integration

scripts.build: npm run build:mobile && npm run build:game && npm run build:fullstack
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd mobile-rn && npm run dev" "cd game-engine && npm run dev" "cd fullstack-integration && npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd mobile-rn && npm install && cd ../game-engine && npm install && cd ../fullstack-integration && npm install
